summary: Adds a bow with a more immersive feel and significantly longer draw time, but balanced damage to the game.
descriptionHtml:
I find myself not immersed with these recurve style bows that pretty much all have unrealisticly fast draw times. I've added a bow to the game to solve that, which (for now) uses the standard longbow model. The bow has a base damage of 27, but a speed of .36, this makes the bow draw over 5 seconds. For comparison, the daedric bow draws in just over 3 seconds.

For some background and basic info on what I'm shooting for go see lindybeige:

[youtube]7ZpDIpqDwxI[/youtube]

The bow is considered Elven, and requires the perk for construction.

Construction Requirements:
2 Quicksilver Ingots
1 Honeycomb
4 Firewood
4 Leather Strips

Tempering:
2 Dwarven Oil

This mod is currently a work in progress. I intend to replace the model with one significantly longer, as well as balance the damage if it turns out to be too high.
author: PhalkonZ
